#!/usr/bin/python
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

stack = []
for i in range(n):
    stack.append(s[i])
    if len(stack) > 1 and stack[-1] == stack[-2]:
        stack.pop()
        stack.pop()

print(n - len(stack))
print(''.join(stack))
#!/usr/bin/python3

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

    stack = []
    for i in range(n):
        stack.append(s[i])
        if len(stack) > 1 and stack[-1] == stack[-2]:
            stack.pop()
            stack.pop()

    print(n - len(stack))
    print(''.join(stack))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
